WALLPOST.TITLE: I'm a %rank_full%
WALLPOST.NAME: I'm a %rank_full% in Nom Nom Nation
WALLPOST.CAPTION: I got a rank of %rank_main% in the %level_theme% of Nom Nom Nation!
WALLPOST.DESCRIPTION: Play Nom Nation, a delicious platform adventure by Playerthree and Channel 4 in which you must unleash the power of the Noms and defeat Jabber The Gut, head of the McFatass Corporation.
